page.title: 08HOUSES
page.content:
{HOUSES}ARE MADE OF BRICKS OR STONE AND SOMETIMES THEY ARE PEBBLEDASHED. SOMETIMES UNDERNEATH THE PEBBLEDASHING THERE ARE BREEZEBLOCKS.SOME HOUSES HAVE GOT A WINDOW IN THE ROOF.THIS IS CALLED A SKYLIGHT.SOME HOUSES HAVE RED TILES,BLACK TILES,GREY TILES OR ORANGE TILES ON THEIR ROOFS. SINCE THE SECOND WORLD WAR THE {ARCHITECTS}HAVE GIVEN A GREAT DEAL OF THOUGHT TO THE DESIGN OF SMALL HOUSES AND SOME OF THEM ARE VERY COMFORTABLE TO LIVE IN.SOME HOUSES HAVE TWO BEDROOMS AND SOME HAVE THREE.
A SURVEY WAS DONE OF HOUSING OVER TWO CLASSES.
{TERRACED SEMI-DETACHED DETACHED}
45 13 4
